rules.formula: AND( Taxa_Instalacao_Minima__c > 0, Valor_da_taxa_de_ades_o__c > Taxa_Instalacao_Minima__c, RecordType.Name = 'Mercosul', CONTAINS(Owner.Profile.Name, 'Argentina') )
AND( Taxa_Instalacao_Minima__c > 0, Valor_da_taxa_de_ades_o__c < Taxa_Instalacao_Minima__c, RecordType.Name = 'Mercosul', CONTAINS(Owner.Profile.Name, 'Argentina') )

AND( Papel_ID__c = '4', Taxa_Instalacao_Minima__c > 0, Valor_da_taxa_de_ades_o__c > Taxa_Instalacao_Minima__c, NOT(BEGINS(LOWER(Pricebook2.Name), 'tipo')), AND( OR( RecordType.Name = 'CORP', RecordType.Name = 'OTR' )))

AND( Papel_ID__c = '4', Taxa_Instalacao_Minima__c > 0, Valor_da_taxa_de_ades_o__c < Taxa_Instalacao_Minima__c, NOT(BEGINS(LOWER(Pricebook2.Name), 'tipo')), AND( OR( RecordType.Name = 'CORP', RecordType.Name = 'OTR' )))

rules.formula: AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Blue_tec', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Demonstracao' ), AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( StageName ) ) ) )
